policy.title: Pricing & Payment Policy *PLEASE READ*
details: LONG TERM: For most part I do not do long term. If the offer were promising, I would consider it.
50% upfront payment required for commissions over $50 / 15k Robux.
Refunds are not provided once the final file has been delivered.
USD payments are accepted via PayPal or CashApp
During the process, I will send progress in intervals, just to establish integrity on both parties
